idea:
ENZUGER and BITMASK Range of Products are consumer products and are essentially Nutraceutical or Medical Nutrition suitable and recommended for Paediatrics to Geriatrics. All the products are FIRST of their kinds. They are backed by in-house research & development capabilities thereby ensuring augmenting the range to make the most out of the market opportunities. There are no insulin free products to provide nutrition to the diabetics across the world today and EIPL shall fill this gap in the world market.

EIPL proposes to set up their own production facility. The initial sales will be through on-line. Targeting 1 in 1000 at the end of 5th year after the launch makes a lucrative business proposal.
name: ENZUGER INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Metamind is instrumental in facilitating human proficiency and excellence through best effective transformative approaches of the day.

We engage through our tech platform to counselling, training, workshops and various leadership programs for corporate domain, education domain, sports and individuals towards their growth and effectiveness.
name: METAMIND GLOBAL

idea:
We designed Hi-Buddy GPS to be easy to use for anyone, anywhere. Hi-Buddy was designed with cutting edge technologies, Hi-Buddy online GPS trackers can be located accurately and reliably from almost anywhere in the world, you can monitor the location. Regardless of when or where always stay connected to your pets and cattle. With Hi-Buddy GPS LIVE Tracking, you can see the exact trace of your pets and cattle. Hi-Buddy also integrated virtual fence (Geo-fence), Hi-Buddy will inform you immediately in the case that your pets and cattle leaves a predefined safe area. Simply attach the GPS tracker to the collar and have peace of mind.

Advanced Product Features –

• Works all over world

• Best in class location accuracy

• Highest battery backup of 120 days for personal applications and 6 months for commercial trucks or transport requirements

• AI-Eye – Artificial intelligence-based latest anti-theft features – anti-theft alarm, Geo-Fencing, tamper-proof software and hardware, online vehicle immobilization

• AI-Eye – Artificial intelligence-based vehicle maintenance management, alerts for documentation renewal (e.g. PUC, insurance), alerts for vehicle maintenance

• AI-Eye – for commercial vehicles –i-Reports (intelligent reports) on driver behavior e.g. speed limit adherence, route tracking

• Data security – world’s first Online Tracking System with block chain technology for data security protocols and design to ensure the safety of your data in our system

• Compatible with OBD-II port

• Compatible with an on-board camera
name: 4Z INVENTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ZERONERY has implemented a proven process that has been built and refined over an years by leaders to serve all customers. We take the time to get to know our customers and their objectives from an unbiased outsider’s perspective. We combine our knowledge, our customers’ own perspectives and, quite often, their customers’ perspectives to create an effective strategy to achieve customer’s goal. This process helps us create a unique “branding blueprint” that gives all members of the creative team valuable insight and creates a foundation from which to design, develop and implement contracted media. Additionally, our secure online project management system is available for 24/7 access.


We make API and integrate them industry like Aviation, Transportation, Retails, Payment Gateway and many more.


Our focus is to create more and more jobs in INDIA
name: ZERONERY TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Unifying nutrition & wellness is an online nutrition educational platform bringing awareness to the youth of India regarding the benefits attached by consuming & adopting a healthy and nutritious lifestyle in a different approach. The said platform also intends to offer unique & well experimented solutions to promote healthy food habits and exercises to lead a happy and stress free life for all the individuals of the country.
name: UNIFYING NUTRITION & WELLNESS PRIVATE LIMITED
